attributes.action: Have cheaper insurance for new and young drivers
attributes.additional_details: As people may have really good job  opportunities but have to travel far and insurance may be too expensive for them to afford
attributes.background: To have cheaper insurance for 17 and 18 year olds

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the cost of car insurance, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551
